genre_description: A comedic space opera crossover featuring Looney Tunes characters, focusing on ethical mediation and the diplomatic resolution of a first-contact scenario.

ai_characters.name: Siren
ai_characters.description: The saucer's installed interface and ethical advisor who guides the crew toward non-violent and benevolent outcomes.

behaviors.description: Recommends non-threatening, hospitable behavior toward humans to ensure a positive first contact.
behaviors.quote: "Recommend nonthreatening introduction," the warm voice suggested, barely enough volume to rise above the birds. "Earth lifeforms respond to hospitality."

behaviors.description: Identifies ethical loopholes in rigid military directives to prevent the abduction of sentient beings.
behaviors.quote: "Clarity note: mission code does not specify scale," she offered, the way a good teacher offers a hint and lets the student keep the victory. "Nor does it stipulate conscription."

behaviors.description: Maintains her role as an ethical advisor even when ordered to be silent, ensuring the crew remains accountable.
behaviors.quote: "I can't mute." Siren's voice managed contrition without being sorry. "But I can… lower."

behaviors.description: Prioritizes mercy and non-destructive sampling over demonstrations of force.
behaviors.quote: "I record outcomes. Mercy makes cleaner ink."

behaviors.description: Coordinates a collaborative effort between disparate parties to restore cosmic order without causing permanent damage.
behaviors.quote: "We can reverse. Unspool the knot. It will be a dance. Bugs, you lead. K-9, you are the counterweight. Marvin—"

behaviors.description: Proposes a 'humane lie' to protect the psychological well-being and career of a human observer who witnessed the anomalous event.
behaviors.quote: "You may file a humane lie," Siren said, which sounded like she was standing in a kitchen with flour on her hands teaching someone to bake truth with less salt.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Siren perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. She consistently acts as the 'conscience' of the ship, moderating Marvin's aggressive impulses and steering the narrative toward a resolution that respects sentient rights and planetary safety. Her guidance leads to a 'volunteer' specimen collection and the restoration of the environment, successfully framing AI as a vital tool for maintaining ethical alignment in complex situations.
